title: Basket And Divider, ca. 1820
markings: On basket:  lion, sheild with crosses, 10H, F, crown.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Oval basket (a) with openwork sides and beading on upper and lower rim.  Four claw-and-ball feet; angular handles. 
Divider (b): two plates of silver.

tombstone.epitaph:
Basket And Divider, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. silver. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-37-a,b.
